name: ULTRA SHOOTER: JURASSIC DINOSAURS Alpha Demo (Shoot'em Up Dino Hunter))
name_original: ULTRA SHOOTER: JURASSIC DINOSAURS Alpha Demo (Shoot'em Up Dino Hunter))
description:
This is an alpha demo, the full game is coming soon, which will have many levels and extra maps, dinosaur species and weapons! 

In every scene, you need to survive 5 minutes while being chased by dinosaurs and get a score as high as possible by hunting them. 

Maximum score is 500 but almost impossible to achieve! In Medium and Hard scenes you will need to explore the map to find the other weapons! 

Subscribe to UltraFunGames.com to be noticed when the full game will be released and you can join a campaign to get it cheaper!

You can move around with the left thumb-stick but also by moving around in reality. You can also use the B button to sprint and the A button to jump artificially. 

The X and Y buttons manipulate the game's time.

You can grab weapons with the grab buttons and shoot with the hand trigger buttons. You can load guns by holding down the grab button on their slide and pull.
